desc: Proof Eyewear offers a wide selection of sunglasses and optical frames handcrafted from sustainable wood, biodegradable cotton-based acetate, and reclaimed recycled aluminum. Frame shapes vary from the classic rectangle, round to over-sized, and unique styles to fit everyday and statement looks.

layout.text: Check out the latest frames to drop from the 2022 Collection. Stay tuned for more frames to be added.
